examples: I'll call the restaurant and make a reservation.
Llamaré al restaurante y haré una reserva.
We have a reservation in the name of Grant.
Tenemos una reserva a nombre de Grant.
I had to cancel my hotel reservation.
Tuve que cancelar mi reserva de hotel.
I have serious reservations about his ability to do the job.
Tengo serias reservas sobre su capacidad para hacer el trabajo.
